meanings.definition: The act of looking outward or beyond.
meanings.sent1: She gained new outsights by exploring different cultures.
meanings.sent2: His outsights helped him understand the world better.
meanings.sent3: The cat's outsights on the bird were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her outsights were like a telescope into the future.
meanings.sent5: The outsights from the mountaintop were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The ability to see beyond the obvious or superficial.
meanings.sent1: His outsights allowed him to uncover hidden truths.
meanings.sent2: Developing outsights can lead to great discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The detective's outsights solved the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her outsights were like a superpower in a world of secrets.
meanings.sent5: The artist's outsights transformed ordinary scenes into masterpieces.

meanings.definition: A view or perspective from outside.
meanings.sent1: The outsights from the balcony were stunning.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the outsights from a different angle.
meanings.sent3: The alien's outsights on Earth were fascinating.
meanings.sent4: His outsights were like a window into another world.
meanings.sent5: The outsights from the spaceship were surreal.
